title: Video Conferencing-Based English Learning Motivation Reinforcement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English conversation and grammar knowledge
context.additional_context: Video conferencing system setup using digital devices and an environment enabling real-time interaction with native speakers

learning_goals: Improve English learning motivation by over 30% after engaging in 20+ conversations with native speakers via video conferencing
Learners demonstrate a 25% or greater increase in confidence when conversing with native speakers after role-playing via video conferencing
Learners advance their practical English proficiency (speaking/listening) to CEFR B1+ level through weekly project presentations and feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
